Interface UserDao

All Known Implementing Classes:

public interface UserDao
Used to connect the Db to to the program

  • Method Details

    • registerConnection

      void registerConnection(ConfigObject config)
      to connect the DAO to a database
      Parameters:
      config - the config object of containing the information for the database

    • signUp

      void signUp(User user) throws SQLException
      Will insert the user to the database No exception handling has been applied to this, simply runs the query to insert the user. if necessary check if user exists or not.
      Parameters:
      user - user to sign up
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there has been any error with communicating with the database

    • signUp

      void signUp(String username, String email, String password) throws SQLException
      Will insert the user to the database No exception handling has been applied to this, simply runs the query to insert the user. if necessary check if user exists or not.
      Parameters:
      username - username of the new user
      email - email of the new user
      password - password of the new user
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there has been any error with communicating with the database

    • usernameExists

      boolean usernameExists(String username) throws SQLException
      a function to see if a given username already exists in our database
      Parameters:
      username - the username we are searching for
      Returns:
      true if the username already exists, false if otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there has been any error with communicating with the database

    • emailExists

      boolean emailExists(String email) throws SQLException
      a function to see whether an email is already in use for a player
      Parameters:
      email - the email we are searching for
      Returns:
      true if the email already exists, false if otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there has been any error with communicating with the database

    • checkPassword

      boolean checkPassword(String username, String password) throws SQLException
      a function to see if the username and password match those stored in the database
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player
      password - the password entered for that username
      Returns:
      true if the password is correct, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there has been any error with communicating with the database

    • deletePlayer

      void deletePlayer(String username) throws SQLException
      a function to delete a player and all of their games from the database
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player we want to delete
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there has been any error with communicating with the database

    • getUsernameFromEmail

      String getUsernameFromEmail(String email) throws SQLException
      a function that returns the username of a corresponding email
      Parameters:
      email - the email belonging to the username we want to retrieve
      Returns:
      the username of the user whose email we entered
      Throws:
      SQLException - if there has been any error with communicating with the database
